mapper.insert: insert into review (movie_num, review_title, review_content, review_rating, user_num) values (#{movieNum}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewRating}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: select * from review where movie_num = #{movieNum} order by review_time desc
mapper.update: update review set review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_rating = #{reviewRating} where review_num = #{reviewNum}
